verses.verse: Don't <S%H8055><s%> rejoice, Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to jubilation <S%H1524><s%> like the nations; <S%H5971><s%> for you were unfaithful to your God. <S%H430><s%> You love <S%H157><s%> the wages <S%H868><s%> of a prostitute <S%H2181><s%> at every grain threshing floor. <S%H1637><s%>
The threshing floor <S%H1637><s%> and the winepress <S%H3342><s%> won't <S%H7462><s%> feed them, <S%H8492><s%> and the new wine will fail her. <S%H3584><s%>

They won't <S%H3427><s%> dwell in Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s land; <S%H776><s%> but Ephraim <S%H669><s%> will return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and they will eat <S%H398><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> food in Assyria. <S%H804><s%>

They won't <S%H5258><s%> pour out wine <S%H3196><s%> offerings to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> neither will they be pleasing <S%H6149><s%> to him. <S%H2077><s%> Their sacrifices will be to them like the bread <S%H3899><s%> of mourners; <S%H205><s%> all who eat <S%H398><s%> of it will be polluted; <S%H2930><s%> for their bread <S%H3899><s%> will be for their appetite. <S%H5315><s%> It will not come <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
What will you do <S%H6213><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of solemn <S%H4150><s%> assembly, <S%H3117><s%> and in the day of the feast <S%H2282><s%> of Yahweh? <S%H3068><s%>

For, <S%H1980><s%> behold, they have gone away from destruction. <S%H7701><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will gather them up. <S%H6908><s%> Memphis <S%H4644><s%> will bury <S%H6912><s%> them. <S%H7057><s%> Nettles will possess <S%H3423><s%> their pleasant <S%H4261><s%> things of silver. <S%H3701><s%> Thorns <S%H2336><s%> will be in their tents. <S%H168><s%>

The days <S%H3117><s%> of visitation <S%H6486><s%> have come. <S%H935><s%> The days <S%H3117><s%> of reckoning <S%H7966><s%> have come. <S%H935><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> will consider <S%H3045><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> to be a fool, <S%H191><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> who is inspired <S%H7307><s%> to be insane, <S%H7696><s%> because of the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of your sins, <S%H5771><s%> and because your hostility <S%H4895><s%> is great. <S%H7227><s%>

A prophet <S%H5030><s%> watches <S%H6822><s%> over Ephraim <S%H669><s%> with my God. <S%H430><s%> A fowler <S%H3352><s%>'s snare <S%H6341><s%> is on all of his paths, <S%H1870><s%> and hostility <S%H4895><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of his God. <S%H430><s%>

They have deeply <S%H6009><s%> corrupted <S%H7843><s%> themselves, <S%H3117><s%> as in the days of Gibeah. <S%H1390><s%> He will remember <S%H2142><s%> their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%> He will punish <S%H6485><s%> them for their sins. <S%H2403><s%>

I found <S%H4672><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> like grapes <S%H6025><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%> I saw <S%H7200><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> as the first ripe <S%H1063><s%> in the fig tree <S%H8384><s%> at its first season; <S%H7225><s%> but they came <S%H935><s%> to Baal <S%H1187><s%> Peor, <S%H5144><s%> and consecrated themselves to the shameful <S%H1322><s%> thing, <S%H5144><s%> and became abominable like that which they loved. <S%H157><s%>

As for Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> their glory <S%H3519><s%> will fly away <S%H5774><s%> like a bird. <S%H5775><s%> There will be no birth, <S%H3205><s%> none with child, <S%H990><s%> and no conception. <S%H2032><s%>

Though they bring up <S%H1431><s%> their children, <S%H1121><s%> yet I will bereave <S%H7921><s%> them, <S%H120><s%> so that not a man shall be left. <S%H188><s%> Indeed, woe also to them when I depart from them! <S%H5493><s%>

I have seen <S%H7200><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> like Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> planted <S%H8362><s%> in a pleasant place; <S%H5116><s%> but Ephraim <S%H669><s%> will bring out <S%H3318><s%> his children <S%H1121><s%> to the murderer. <S%H2026><s%>
Give <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>â€”Yahweh what will you give? <S%H5414><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> them a miscarrying <S%H7921><s%> womb <S%H7358><s%> and dry <S%H6784><s%> breasts. <S%H7699><s%>

"All their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is in Gilgal; <S%H1537><s%> for there I hated <S%H8130><s%> them. <S%H7455><s%> Because of the wickedness of their deeds <S%H4611><s%> I will drive them out <S%H1644><s%> of my house! <S%H1004><s%> I will love <S%H160><s%> them no more. <S%H3254><s%> All their princes <S%H8269><s%> are rebels. <S%H5637><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is struck. <S%H5221><s%> Their root <S%H8328><s%> has dried up. <S%H3001><s%> They will bear <S%H6213><s%> no fruit. <S%H6529><s%> Even though they bring forth, <S%H3205><s%> yet I will kill <S%H4191><s%> the beloved <S%H4261><s%> ones of their womb. <S%H990><s%>"
My God <S%H430><s%> will cast them away, <S%H3988><s%> because they did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to him; <S%H5074><s%> and they will be wanderers among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>
